title: Mile Time
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, American, Chinese, International, Western, Juice bar
description: Serves a variety of dishes from veggie burgers to lasagna, chow mein, soups, salads and more. Has vegan options. Has an extensive juice/smoothie menu as well as a dessert menu. Entrees are between $4-$8. Almost all desserts have egg in them, as well as most dishes, so vegans ask for no eggs. In-house-made veggie meat.
